data.name: Sample - Graylog - 1.0.0
data.description: Sample playbooks for "Graylog" connector. If you are planning to use any of the sample playbooks in your environment, ensure that you clone those playbooks and move them to a different collection, since the sample playbook collection gets deleted during connector upgrade and delete.

workflows.name: Search Absolute
workflows.description: Search for a events in Graylog based on the input parameters that you have specified.

routes.name: Start -> Search Messages in Absolute Timerange

workflows.name: Get Cluster Node JVM
workflows.description: Retrieve a JVM information of the node from Graylog based on the node ID you have specified.

workflows.name: > GrayLog > Ingest
workflows.description: This playbook demonstrate the list messages operation.

routes.name: Create Record -> Update Last Alert Pull Time

workflows.name: Get Alerts
workflows.description: Retrieves a list of alerts from Graylog

workflows.name: Get Cluster Node Metrics
workflows.description: Retrieve all metrics for a specific node in the cluster from Graylog

workflows.name: Get Cluster Input States
workflows.description: Retrieve a input states of the cluster from Graylog.

workflows.name: Search Relative
workflows.description: Search for a messages in a universal relative timerange from Graylog based on the query, and other input parameters that you have specified.

routes.name: Start -> Search Messages in Relative Timerange

workflows.name: Get Cluster Processing Status
workflows.description: Retrieve a processing status of the cluster from Graylog.

workflows.name: Search Events
workflows.description: Search for a events in Graylog based on the input parameters that you have specified.

workflows.name: Get Clusters Lookup Tables
workflows.description: Retrieves a list of clusters lookup tables from Graylog

workflows.name: >>GrayLog > Init Macros
workflows.description: This playbook create Graylog macros if not exist.

routes.name: Fetch Macro Current Value -> Update Marco If Required
GrayLog Macro Exists -> Create GrayLog Macro
routes.label: No

routes.name: Get GrayLog Macros -> GrayLog Macro Exists
GrayLog Macro Exists -> Fetch Macro Current Value
routes.label: Yes

workflows.name: Get Cluster Metrics
workflows.description: Retrieve all metrics of all nodes in the cluster from Graylog

workflows.name: Get Clusters
workflows.description: Retrieves a list of clusters from Graylog.

workflows.name: Get Streams
workflows.description: Retrieves a list of streams from Graylog.

workflows.name: > GrayLog > Fetch Messages
workflows.description: Fetches all messages from Graylog based on the input parameters you have specified.

step_variables._configuration_schema:
[
{
    "title": "Query",
    "description": "Specify a lucene syntax query based on which you want to search for a messages in a absolute timerange from Graylog.",
    "required": true,
    "editable": true,
    "visible": true,
    "type": "text",
    "name": "query",
    "tooltip": "Specify a lucene syntax query based on which you want to search for a messages."
},
{
    "title": "Pull Incidents from Last X Minutes",
    "name": "Pull_Sample_Events_in_Past_X_Minutes",
    "type": "text",
    "tooltip": "Fetch incidents from last X minutes. e.g 5",
    "required": true,
    "editable": true,
    "visible": true,
    "value": 10
  }
]

routes.name: Get Macro Value -> Set Time Configuration

workflows.name: Get Cluster Node Metrics Names
workflows.description: Retrieve all metrics keys/names from node in the cluster from Graylog.

arguments.title: GrayLog: Get Cluster Node Metrics Names

routes.name: Start -> Get Cluster Node Metrics Names

workflows.name: Get Indexer Cluster Health
workflows.description: Retrieve a indexer of the cluster health from Graylog.
